meanings.definition: The process of converting information into a digital format.
meanings.sent1: Digitalization helps in changing data to a digital form.
meanings.sent2: Many companies are embracing digitalization to modernize their operations.
meanings.sent3: The party theme was digitalization, where guests had to dress as their favorite emojis.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a digitalization machine, swiftly processing all details.
meanings.sent5: The classroom was a whirlwind of digitalization, with students using tablets for every task.

meanings.definition: The use of digital technology to improve business processes.
meanings.sent1: Businesses are adopting digitalization to enhance their efficiency.
meanings.sent2: Digitalization has revolutionized how companies manage their workflows.
meanings.sent3: The digitalization of the bakery's ordering system made customers' mouths water with anticipation.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, digitalization is the key to unlocking success.
meanings.sent5: The digitalization of the inventory system saved the company time and money.

meanings.definition: The transformation of analog data into digital form.
meanings.sent1: The digitalization of old records preserved them for future generations.
meanings.sent2: Libraries are undergoing digitalization to make historical documents more accessible.
meanings.sent3: The artist's digitalization of classic paintings gave them a modern twist.
meanings.sent4: The digitalization of music has made it easier to carry thousands of songs in a pocket.
meanings.sent5: Digitalization of photographs ensures they won't fade or get damaged over time.
